docs.lead_paragraph: Pfizer, which plans to enjoy a lower tax rate in Ireland after a merger with Allergan, has long employed various tax avoidance strategies.
docs.snippet: Pfizer, which plans to enjoy a lower tax rate in Ireland after a merger with Allergan, has long employed various tax avoidance strategies....
docs.abstract: Andrew Ross Sorkin DealBook column points out Pfizer, which merged with Allergan to move to tax shelter in Ireland, has history of various tax avoidance strategies going back to at least 1976; observes that it established itself in Puerto Rico for unusual tax credit program.
